docs.text: Cinder Converted this site from a mkdocs default to Cinder . The trickiest aspect was me mistakenly putting tab characters in the YAML otherwise it was straight-forward. 24 July 2020 A5 Booklets Working with pgfmorepages to produce an A5 booklet with notes on Etching technique. I was doing an afternoon class at the Putney School of Art & Design. Then we had lockdown. 23 July 2020 Python Environments Goodness I am making heavy weather of this, but I have now been trying pipenv in addition to pyenv on the mac. My machine is nearly 8 yo, so it is littered with my fiddling, but still it shouldn’t be hard. Anyway I have whatever default pythons apple provide on the machine, the latest package from python.org and two pyenv pythons (2.7.8 & 3.8.2). Probably a recipe for trouble but that is where I am. I upgrade pcbmode to cinco, and it is working. 20 July 2020

docs.text: Goodness I am making heavy weather of this, but I have now been trying pipenv in addition to pyenv on the mac. My machine is nearly 8 yo, so it is littered with my fiddling, but still it shouldn’t be hard. Anyway I have whatever default pythons apple provide on the machine, the latest package from python.org and two pyenv pythons (2.7.8 & 3.8.2). Probably a recipe for trouble but that is where I am. I upgrade pcbmode to cinco, and it is working. 20 July 2020
docs.title: Python Environments

docs.text: About me I am older person pretending to stay in touch with technology. I am presently learning LaTeX and particularly Tikz, the latter directly, and also using TikZiT . I am also learning more OpenSCAD using nophead’s NopSCADlib . I am a patron of the Royal Institution which means nothing more than giving a little extra to support it. I have enjoyed some magical evenings at the lectures. I am a patron of the De Morgan Collection which cares for the art and legacy of Evelyn and William De Morgan.
